## Hi There, I'm Tarush. Nice to meet you.


[![LinkedIn](https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/LinkedIn-0A66C2?logo=linkedin-white&logoColor=fff&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tarush-gupta-551139334/)

[![VeriCare](https://img.shields.io/badge/VeriCare-111827?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoWidth=18&style=for-the-badge)](https://vericareai.com)

I'm a student at [The Harker School](https://www.harker.org/), focused on AI, ML, and systems building.
 
I've worked at companies like [Turing](https://www.turing.com/), [HumanX](https://www.humanx.co/), and [Ema Unlimited](https://www.ema.co/).

I cofounded [VeriCare AI](https://www.vericareai.com/), using AI to democratize medical billing for everyone. I also host [Neural Briddge Podcast](https://www.youtube.com/@NeuralBridgePodcast/), "Bridging the Gap" for Gen Z students interested in AI. 

If you are interested, you can email me [here for VeriCare](mailto:vericareai@gmail.com)  and [here for Neural Bridge](mailto:neuralbridgepodcast@gmail.com).
